whenYouVisit: When you visit our website, you agree to these terms.
theWebsiiteReserves: The Website reserves the right to change, modify, add or omit any part of the Terms and Conditions of Use, at any time. Changes are effective immediately upon posting on the website without prior notice.
andWhenYouContinue: And when you continue to use the website, after the changes to the Terms and Conditions are posted, it means that you accept those changes.
pleaseCheckBack: Please check back regularly to stay up to date with our changes. Please read carefully before making a purchase:
whenAccessing: When accessing our website, users must be at least 18 years of age or under the supervision of a parent or legal guardian.
itIsStricly: It is strictly forbidden to use any part of this website with the commercial purposes or on behalf of any third party partner otherwise with our written permission. If you violate any here, we will cancel your license without notice before.
thisWebsite: This website is for the purpose of providing product information only We are not a manufacturer.
youMustRegister: You must register an account with the credentials of themselves and must be updated if there are any changes. Everyone Access must be responsible for passwords, accounts and activities on the web.
inAddition: In addition, you must notify us when your account has been accessed without authorization. We do not accept any responsibility, whether directly or indirectly, for damages or losses caused by your failure to comply with the regulations
allWebsiteContent: All website content and your comments are our property. If we detect any fraudulent information, we will immediately block your account or take other measures in accordance with the laws of Vietnam.
whenYouPlace: When you place an order at HelloMilky.shop, we will receive the order request and send it to you However, the order request needs to go through an order confirmation step, HelloMilky.shop, only confirm the order if your order request meets the criteria for order fulfillment at
inOrderTo: In order to request a prompt order confirmation, please provide correct and complete information related to delivery, or the terms and conditions of the promotion (if any) in which you participate.
orderValue: 4. Order value and form of payment
helloMilkyShop: HelloMilky.shop provide payment methods: cash upon receipt, direct payment to ship, payment at the store, payment via bank transfer.
unless: Unless otherwise noted, you can usually choose one of the above 3 forms of payment when placing an order.
theRulesOfThePromotion: The rules of the promotion will be updated on the promotion page from time to time and may be changed without prior notice to customers.
HelloMilky.shop: HelloMilky.shop reserves the right to refuse orders that do not satisfy the terms and conditions of participation in the promotions without notice to the customer. Therefore, please refer to the rules of each program carefully before participating.
aDiscountCode: A discount code is a form of discount that Shopmebi.com offer customers that may have a value that reduces part or all of the value of the order.
discountCodes: Discount codes can be Shopmebi.com for each individual customer, or universal for all customers participating in the program. The conditions of each discount code will be clearly stipulated for each program, and are only valid when customers use them on time, the way of use has been prescribed.
toTheCustomer: HelloMilky.shop reserves the right to reject requests to use discount codes that do not meet the requirements of the promotion without prior notice to the customer.
atHelloMilkyShop: At HelloMilky.shop, we are committed to protecting your information privacy to the utmost. However, please read the terms of the Terms and Conditions carefully to better understand our privacy policy.
storePersonalInformation: HelloMilky.shop reserves the right to store personal information and transactions of customers for the purpose of investigation, complaint resolution, and customer program management, but we will not disclose this information without the consent of the customer.
allFormOfPersonal: All forms of personal and account copyright in the customer's account when registering are responsible for passwords, accounts and activities on our website.
withEachProduct: With each product you buy, you are entitled to a warranty on technical defects, if the product has technical defects, you will get a free warranty, replacement and repair of the product. The expiration date of the product depends on our mode.
isNotResponsible: HelloMilky.shop is not responsible for some technical errors that occur unrelated to the product. However, we will not be held responsible for some technical defects that occur unrelated to the product.
ifYouWant: If you want to cancel your order, please contact us via our hotline or our email for assistance.
weWillHelpYou: We will help you solve other problems such as missing products or defective products during shipping to you.
youCanUnsubscribe: We will notify you by email of policy change notices. You can unsubscribe at any time if you do not wish to receive notification emails from us.
thisClause: This clause shall be enforceable and effective from the date of notification.
weReserve: We reserve the right to update these terms again without prior notice to you. Therefore, please check back regularly to stay up to date with the latest changes.
weAreYou: We are not liable in the event of delays or suspension of services due to force majeure reasons such as natural disasters, wars, protests, laws or government actions.
inCaseOf: In case of disputes, please contact us via email or phone number for the best support.
24Hours: We will resolve disputes quickly and efficiently within 24 hours.
